Folder.label: VERILOG Component Instantiation
Folder.Template:
// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
datamem64 YourInstanceName ( .clka(clka), .dina(dina), // Bus [63 : 0] .addra(addra), // Bus [7 : 0] .wea(wea), // Bus [0 : 0] .douta(douta), // Bus [63 : 0] .clkb(clkb), .dinb(dinb), // Bus [63 : 0] .addrb(addrb), // Bus [7 : 0] .web(web), // Bus [0 : 0] .doutb(doutb)); // Bus [63 : 0]

// The following must be inserted into your Verilog file for this // core to be instantiated. Change the instance name and port connections // (in parentheses) to your own signal names.
instructionmem64 YourInstanceName ( .clka(clka), .dina(dina), // Bus [31 : 0] .addra(addra), // Bus [8 : 0] .wea(wea), // Bus [0 : 0] .clkb(clkb), .addrb(addrb), // Bus [8 : 0] .doutb(doutb)); // Bus [31 : 0]

Folder.label: VHDL Component Instantiation
